alert.note: Alert for Eastern Pendleton; Western Pendleton (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 4:06AM EST until January 29 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 4 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, with locally higher totals on the ridges. * WHERE...Portions of western Virginia and eastern West Virginia. * WHEN...From 10 AM this morning to 4 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
